section.title: Viewing Event Logs for an Instance or Image
section.para: Using an Analysis Profile, collect event log information from your instances. See the Creating a Default Analysis Profile section CloudForms Management Engine Settings and Operations Guide.

note.para: This feature is only available for Windows.

step.para: Click the accordion for the item to view event logs.
Click on the item to view its Summary.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The collected event log entries are displayed. Sort this list by clicking on the column headers.
